Bash(git -C /Users/bgood/Documents/GitHub/OKN-WOBD add pyproject.toml config/mcp-dev.json config/biomni.yaml src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/__init__.py src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/__main__.py src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/server.py src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/tools_analysis.py src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/tools_chatgeo.py tests/test_mcp_server.py tests/test_mcp_analysis_tools.py tests/test_mcp_chatgeo_tools.py tests/test_mcp_integration.py)

Bash(git -C /Users/bgood/Documents/GitHub/OKN-WOBD commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add MCP server exposing analysis tools for Claude Desktop and Biomni

Implements an MCP stdio server \(src/okn_wobd/mcp_server/\) that wraps the
existing analysis_tools and chatgeo packages as 7 MCP tools:
- health_check, gene_disease_paths, gene_neighborhood,
  drug_disease_opposing_expression, differential_expression,
  find_samples, enrichment_analysis

Key design decisions:
- stdout→stderr redirect \(MCP uses stdout for JSON-RPC\)
- SystemExit catch \(chatgeo calls sys.exit on errors\)
- Error dicts instead of exceptions for graceful degradation
- Conservative defaults \(200 samples, 30s SPARQL timeout\) to stay
  within Claude Desktop''s ~60s tool call timeout
- Tool descriptions include runtime estimates to guide LLM usage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bgood/Documents/GitHub/OKN-WOBD commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add background job dispatch for slow DE methods \(deseq2\)

Fast methods \(mann-whitney, welch-t\) run synchronously within the ~60s
MCP client timeout. DESeq2 is dispatched to a background thread and
returns a job_id immediately — poll with get_analysis_result\(\) tool.

Changes:
- Default method: deseq2 → mann-whitney \(fast, ~20-40s\)
- Default samples: 500 → 100 \(faster data retrieval\)
- New get_analysis_result tool for polling background jobs
- Thread-safe job store with status tracking and elapsed time

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
